text.p: Suppose [mathjaxinline]T: V\rightarrow W[/mathjaxinline] is a linear transformation. Is the question of whether [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is into an existence question or a uniqueness question?

font.p: [mathjaxinline]T[/mathjaxinline] is into if, for any [mathjaxinline]v[/mathjaxinline], the equation [mathjaxinline]T(x) = v[/mathjaxinline] never has more than one solution. This is a uniqueness question.
